Author: AzurIce
Name: XIVTouchPad
Punchline: Native-like touchpad gesture support for camera control.
Description: XIVTouchPad unlocks smooth, native-feeling touchpad gestures for Final Fantasy XIV. It utilizes raw input hooks to enable two-finger scrolling for camera rotation (Yaw/Pitch), offering a much smoother experience than standard mouse emulation. Includes configurable sensitivity and axis inversion settings.
